languages.text: Перед глазами плывет, и вам кажется, что человек в капюшоне напялил на плечи вместо головы омнископ. От такой глупости становится смешно.
With your wavering vision, you see a hooded figure that appears to have an omniscope for a head. The absurdity of it nearly makes you laugh.
languages.original_text: Перед глазами плывет, и вам кажется, что человек в капюшоне напялил на плечи вместо головы омнископ. От такой глупости становится смешно.

traits.locale_text: With your wavering vision, you see a hooded figure that appears to have an omniscope for a head. The absurdity of it nearly makes you laugh.
With your wavering vision, you see a hooded figure that appears to have an omniscope for a head. The absurdity of it nearly makes you laugh.
With your wavering vision, you see a hooded figure that appears to have an omniscope for a head. The absurdity of it nearly makes you laugh.

With your wavering vision, you see a hooded figure that appears to have an omniscope for a head. The absurdity of it nearly makes you laugh.
With your wavering vision, you see a hooded figure that appears to have an omniscope for a head. The absurdity of it nearly makes you laugh.

languages.text: 揺らめく視界の中で、頭部にオムニスコープを装着したようなフードを被った人影が見える。あまりの不条理さに笑いそうになる。
languages.original_text: With your wavering vision, you see a hooded figure that appears to have an omniscope for a head. The absurdity of it nearly makes you laugh.

traits.locale_text: 揺らめく視界の中で、頭部にオムニスコープを装着したようなフードを被った人影が見える。あまりの不条理さに笑いそうになる。

languages.text: 在你摇摆不定的视线中，你看到了一个戴着兜帽的人，脑袋似乎变成了一个观测镜。这荒谬的一幕几乎让你笑出声来。
languages.original_text: With your wavering vision, you see a hooded figure that appears to have an omniscope for a head. The absurdity of it nearly makes you laugh.

traits.locale_text: 在你摇摆不定的视线中，你看到了一个戴着兜帽的人，脑袋似乎变成了一个观测镜。这荒谬的一幕几乎让你笑出声来。

languages.text: A través de tu mirada borrosa, ves una figura encapuchada que parece tener un omniscopio por cabeza. Es tan absurdo que casi te provoca una carcajada.
languages.original_text: With your wavering vision, you see a hooded figure that appears to have an omniscope for a head. The absurdity of it nearly makes you laugh.

traits.locale_text: A través de tu mirada borrosa, ves una figura encapuchada que parece tener un omniscopio por cabeza. Es tan absurdo que casi te provoca una carcajada.

languages.text: In deiner schwankenden Sicht siehst du eine Gestalt in einer Robe, die offenbar ein Omniskop als Kopf hat. Es ist so absurd, dass du fast lachen musst.
languages.original_text: With your wavering vision, you see a hooded figure that appears to have an omniscope for a head. The absurdity of it nearly makes you laugh.

traits.locale_text: In deiner schwankenden Sicht siehst du eine Gestalt in einer Robe, die offenbar ein Omniskop als Kopf hat. Es ist so absurd, dass du fast lachen musst.

languages.text: Malgré votre vision trouble, vous discernez une silhouette encapuchonnée dont la tête a été remplacée par un omniscope. Vous vous retenez à grand-peine de rire face à une telle absurdité.
languages.original_text: With your wavering vision, you see a hooded figure that appears to have an omniscope for a head. The absurdity of it nearly makes you laugh.

traits.locale_text: Malgré votre vision trouble, vous discernez une silhouette encapuchonnée dont la tête a été remplacée par un omniscope. Vous vous retenez à grand-peine de rire face à une telle absurdité.

languages.text: Sarsak görüşünle başının yerinde bir periskop varmış gibi gözüken, kapüşonlu bir figür görüyorsun. Absürtlüğü seni güldürecek gibi oluyor.
languages.original_text: With your wavering vision, you see a hooded figure that appears to have an omniscope for a head. The absurdity of it nearly makes you laugh.

traits.locale_text: Sarsak görüşünle başının yerinde bir periskop varmış gibi gözüken, kapüşonlu bir figür görüyorsun. Absürtlüğü seni güldürecek gibi oluyor.
